definition: the act of mixing together, add as an additional element or part
details:
noun
- the act of mixing together
= example: the act of mixing together
= synonyms: commixture, admixture, mixture, intermixture, mixing
- an event that combines things in a mixture
= example: an event that combines things in a mixture
= synonyms: mixture
- a commercially prepared mixture of dry ingredients
= synonyms: premix
verb
- add as an additional element or part
= example: add as an additional element or part
= synonyms: mix in
- mix together different elements
= synonyms: flux
- combine (electronic signals)
= example: combine (electronic signals)
- mix so as to make a random order or arrangement
= synonyms: shuffle
- to bring or combine together or with something else
= synonyms: amalgamate, unify, mingle, commix
- open (a place) to members of all races and ethnic groups
= synonyms: integrate, desegregate
